publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1958.1 Iain Gray: Justiceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1958) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "with concern" to end and insert "the increased resources going into the justice system as a whole; further notes the decision of the Justice 2 Committee to hold an inquiry into the operation of the Crown Office and the Procurator Fiscal Service, and looks forward to their report." Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
